Uses of Class
gui.DPoint

  • Packages that use DPoint 
    Package Description
    gui
    The graphical user interface for the shortest paths algorithm (you don't need to look at or understand this package, but you can run it to play with the gui).

    • Uses of DPoint in gui

      Methods in gui that return DPoint 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DPoint DPoint.addVector​(DPoint v)
      Add v's components to this point and return this DPoint
      DPoint Circle.getVectorTo​(Circle c)
      Return the vector from the center of this circle to the center of c.
      DPoint DPoint.invert()
      Invert both of this' components - change this point to <1/x, 1/y>
      -- and returns this DPoint.
      Precondition: the x and y components are not 0.
      DPoint DPoint.mult​(double s)
      Multiply both of this point's components by s and return this DPoint.
      DPoint DPoint.to​(DPoint b)
      Return a new point from this to b.
      DPoint DPoint.unit()
      Make this vector have length 1, with the same direction,
      and Return this DPoint.
      Precondition: this point is not (0, 0).
      Methods in gui with parameters of type DPoint 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DPoint DPoint.addVector​(DPoint v)
      Add v's components to this point and return this DPoint
      double DPoint.cos​(DPoint b)
      Return the cosine of the angle between this and b.
      static double DPoint.cos​(DPoint a, DPoint b)
      Return the cosine of the angle between a and b
      double DPoint.cross​(DPoint b)
      Return the cross product of this and b.
      static double DPoint.cross​(DPoint a, DPoint b)
      Return the cross product of a and b.
      Because vectors are 2-d, the return is a vector of the form <0, 0, z>
      So a 1-D vector.
      double DPoint.distance​(DPoint b)
      Return the distance between this point and b.
      static double DPoint.distance​(DPoint a, DPoint b)
      Return the distance between a and b.
      double DPoint.dot​(DPoint b)
      Return the dot product of this DPoint and b.
      static double DPoint.dot​(DPoint a, DPoint b)
      Return the dot product of a and b/
      static double DPoint.length​(DPoint a)
      Return the length of a.
      double DPoint.radAngle​(DPoint b)
      Return the angle between this and b, in radians.
      static double DPoint.radAngle​(DPoint a, DPoint b)
      Return the angle between a and b, in radians.
      DPoint DPoint.to​(DPoint b)
      Return a new point from this to b.
      Constructors in gui with parameters of type DPoint 
      Constructor Description
      DPoint​(DPoint v)
      Constructor: a point with same values as v.
